usage.cn: 不可思议的是，即使他令你心碎，你却依然用破碎的心爱着他。
usage.eng: It's amazing how someone can break your heart, but you still love them with all the little pieces.

usage.cn: 世界上最令人激动的一件事情是，你原本以为没有机会靠近的人，竟然爱上了你。
usage.eng: One of the most amazing thing in the world is having someone who falls in love with you thought you never had a chance with.

usage.cn: 如果她很棒，不会很好追。如果她很好追，则不会很棒。如果她值得，你不该放弃。如果你放弃，则是你不配。
usage.eng: If she's amazing, she won't be easy. If she's easy, she won't be amazing. If she's worth it, you won't give up. If you give up, you're not worth it.
